001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import java.util.AbstractMap;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Arrays;
006import java.util.LinkedList;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009import java.util.NavigableMap;
010import java.util.NavigableSet;
011import java.util.SequencedMap;
012import java.util.SequencedSet;
013import java.util.stream.IntStream;
014import java.util.stream.Stream;
015
016import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toLinkedListReversed;
017import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toLinkedMap;
018import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toLinkedSet;
019import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toListReversed;
020import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toSortedMap;
021import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toSortedSet;
022
023/**
024 * Utility-class that provides methods to transform the stream or var-args-arrays of values into linked or sorted sets
025 * and stream or var-args-arrays of {@link Map.Entry entries} into linked or sorted map.
026 * An enumeration {@link MergeFunction} could be used to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}.
027 */
028public class CoreStreamUtils {
029
030    // ===========================================================================================
031    //        Utility-methods to create a reverse streams from the given array or list
032    // ===========================================================================================
033
034    public static IntStream reversed(int... valuesArr) {
035        return IntStream.rangeClosed(1, valuesArr.length).map(i -> valuesArr[valuesArr.length - i]);
036    }
037    public static IntStream reversed(List<Integer> valuesList) {
038        return IntStream.rangeClosed(1, valuesList.size()).map(i -> valuesList.get(valuesList.size() - i));
039    }
040
041    public static int[] reversedArr(int... valuesArr) {
042        return reversed(valuesArr).toArray();
043    }
044    public static int[] reversedArr(java.util.stream.IntStream values) {
045        return reversedArr(values.toArray());
046    }
047
048    public static ArrayList<Integer> reversedList(int... valuesArr) {
049        return reversedList(Arrays.stream(valuesArr).boxed());
050    }
051    public static ArrayList<Integer> reversedList(IntStream values) {
052        return reversedList(values.boxed());
053    }
054    public static <T> ArrayList<T> reversedList(Stream<T> boxedStream) {
055        return boxedStream.collect(toListReversed());
056    }
057    public static <T> ArrayList<T> reversedList(List<T> valuesList) {
058        return reversedList(valuesList.stream());
059    }
060
061    public static LinkedList<Integer> reversedLinkedList(int... valuesArr) {
062        return reversedLinkedList(Arrays.stream(valuesArr).boxed());
063    }
064    public static LinkedList<Integer> reversedLinkedList(IntStream values) {
065        return reversedLinkedList(values.boxed());
066    }
067    public static <T> LinkedList<T> reversedLinkedList(Stream<T> boxedStream) {
068        return boxedStream.collect(toLinkedListReversed());
069    }
070    public static <T> LinkedList<T> reversedLinkedList(List<T> valuesList) {
071        return reversedLinkedList(valuesList.stream());
072    }
073
074    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
075
076    /**
077     * @param valuesArr var-args-arrays of values
078     * @return the sorted set of those values as {@link NavigableSet}
079     * @param <T> the type of value
080     */
081    @SafeVarargs
082    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
083    public static <T extends Comparable<T>> NavigableSet<T> sortedSet(T... valuesArr) {
084        return sortedSet(Arrays.stream(valuesArr));
085    }
086
087    /**
088     * @param values stream of values
089     * @return the sorted set of those values as {@link NavigableSet}
090     * @param <T> the type of value
091     */
092    public static <T extends Comparable<T>> NavigableSet<T> sortedSet(Stream<T> values) {
093        return values.collect(toSortedSet());
094    }
095
096    /**
097     * @param valuesArr var-args-arrays of values
098     * @return the linked set of those values as {@link SequencedSet}
099     * @param <T> the type of value
100     */
101    @SafeVarargs
102    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
103    public static <T> SequencedSet<T> linkedSet(T... valuesArr) {
104        return linkedSet(Arrays.stream(valuesArr));
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * @param values stream of values
109     * @return the linked set of those values as {@link SequencedSet}
110     * @param <T> the type of value
111     */
112    public static <T> SequencedSet<T> linkedSet(Stream<T> values) {
113        return values.collect(toLinkedSet());
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * A factory-method to produce an instance of {@link Map.Entry} from {@code key} and {@code value}.
118     *
119     * @param key a key of entry to create
120     * @param value a value of entry to create
121     * @return an instance of {@link Map.Entry} as {@link AbstractMap.SimpleEntry}
122     * @param <K> the type of key
123     * @param <V> the type of value
124     */
125    public static <K, V> Map.Entry<K, V> keyValue(K key, V value) {
126        return new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<>(key, value);
127    }
128
129    /**
130     * The same as {@link #keyValue(Object, Object) keyValue(K key, V value)},
131     * but when the type of {@code key} is {@link String} (we can call such {@code key} as {@code name} in this case).
132     *
133     * @param name a name of entry to create
134     * @param value a value of entry to create
135     * @return an instance of {@link Map.Entry} as {@link AbstractMap.SimpleEntry}
136     * @param <V> the type of value
137     */
138    public static <V> Map.Entry<String, V> nameValue(String name, V value) {
139        return keyValue(name, value);
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the sorted map,
144     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
145     * with the default merge-function {@link MergeFunction#OVERWRITE}.
146     * <hr/>
147     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
148     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
149     *
150     * @param entriesArr var-args-arrays of entries
151     * @return the sorted map, which is collected from those entries, as {@link NavigableMap},
152     * @param <K> the type of key
153     * @param <V> the type of value
154     */
155    @SafeVarargs
156    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
157    public static <K extends Comparable<K>, V> NavigableMap<K, V>
158    sortedMap(Map.Entry<K,V>... entriesArr) {
159        return sortedMap(Arrays.stream(entriesArr).filter(CoreStreamUtils::entryIsValid));
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the sorted map,
164     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
165     * with the passed {@code mergeFunction}.
166     * <hr/>
167     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
168     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
169     *
170     * @param mergeFunction the merge-function to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}
171     * @param entriesArr var-args-arrays of entries
172     * @return the sorted map, which is collected from those entries, as {@link NavigableMap},
173     * @param <K> the type of key
174     * @param <V> the type of value
175     */
176    @SafeVarargs
177    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
178    public static <K extends Comparable<K>, V> NavigableMap<K, V>
179    sortedMap(MergeFunction mergeFunction, Map.Entry<K,V>... entriesArr) {
180        return sortedMap(mergeFunction, Arrays.stream(entriesArr));
181    }
182
183    /**
184     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the sorted map,
185     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
186     * with the default merge-function {@link MergeFunction#OVERWRITE}.
187     * <hr/>
188     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
189     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
190     *
191     * @param entries stream of entries
192     * @return the sorted map, which is collected from those entries, as {@link NavigableMap},
193     * @param <K> the type of key
194     * @param <V> the type of value
195     */
196    public static <K extends Comparable<K>, V> NavigableMap<K, V>
197    sortedMap(Stream<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries) {
198        return entries.collect(toSortedMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue));
199    }
200
201    /**
202     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the sorted map,
203     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
204     * with the passed {@code mergeFunction}.
205     * <hr/>
206     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
207     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
208     *
209     * @param mergeFunction the merge-function to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}
210     * @param entries stream of entries
211     * @return the sorted map, which is collected from those entries, as {@link NavigableMap},
212     * @param <K> the type of key
213     * @param <V> the type of value
214     */
215    public static <K extends Comparable<K>, V> NavigableMap<K, V>
216    sortedMap(MergeFunction mergeFunction, Stream<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries) {
217        return entries.collect(toSortedMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue, mergeFunction));
218    }
219
220    /**
221     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the linked map,
222     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
223     * with the default merge-function {@link MergeFunction#OVERWRITE}.
224     * <hr/>
225     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
226     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
227     *
228     * @param entriesArr var-args-arrays of entries
229     * @return the linked map, which is collected from {@code entries}, as {@link SequencedMap},
230     * @param <K> the type of key
231     * @param <V> the type of value
232     */
233    @SafeVarargs
234    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
235    public static <K, V> SequencedMap<K, V>
236    linkedMap(Map.Entry<K,V>... entriesArr) {
237        return linkedMap(Arrays.stream(entriesArr).filter(CoreStreamUtils::entryIsValid));
238    }
239
240    /**
241     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the linked map,
242     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
243     * with the passed {@code mergeFunction}.
244     * <hr/>
245     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
246     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
247     *
248     * @param mergeFunction the merge-function to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}
249     * @param entriesArr var-args-arrays of entries
250     * @return the linked map, which is collected from {@code entries}, as {@link SequencedMap},
251     * @param <K> the type of key
252     * @param <V> the type of value
253     */
254    @SafeVarargs
255    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
256    public static <K, V> SequencedMap<K, V>
257    linkedMap(MergeFunction mergeFunction, Map.Entry<K,V>... entriesArr) {
258        return linkedMap(mergeFunction, Arrays.stream(entriesArr));
259    }
260
261    /**
262     * Transform the stream of entries into the linked map,
263     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
264     * with the default merge-function {@link MergeFunction#OVERWRITE}.
265     * <hr/>
266     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
267     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
268     *
269     * @param entries stream of entries
270     * @return the linked map, which is collected from {@code entries}, as {@link SequencedMap},
271     * @param <K> the type of key
272     * @param <V> the type of value
273     */
274    public static <K, V> SequencedMap<K, V>
275    linkedMap(Stream<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries) {
276        return entries.collect(toLinkedMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue));
277    }
278
279    /**
280     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the linked map,
281     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
282     * with the passed {@code mergeFunction}.
283     * <hr/>
284     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
285     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
286     *
287     * @param mergeFunction the merge-function to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}
288     * @param entries stream of entries
289     * @return the linked map, which is collected from {@code entries}, as {@link SequencedMap},
290     * @param <K> the type of key
291     * @param <V> the type of value
292     */
293    public static <K, V> SequencedMap<K, V>
294    linkedMap(MergeFunction mergeFunction, Stream<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries) {
295        return entries.collect(toLinkedMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue, mergeFunction));
296    }
297
298    /**
299     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} in JDK's collectors
300     * all entries that are {@code null} or whose key or value is {@code null} should be filtered out.
301     *
302     * @param entry an entry to filter
303     * @return {@code true} if the entry is valid and otherwise - {@code false}
304     */
305    public static boolean entryIsValid(Map.Entry<?,?> entry) {
306        return entry != null && entry.getKey() != null && entry.getValue() != null;
307    }
308
309    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
310
311    private CoreStreamUtils() {
312        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
313        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate utility-class " + getClass().getName());
314    }
315}
